scripts.publish: cd packages/ag-grid-quick-filter && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.start-local: cd examples/ag-grid-quick-filter && npm run prepare && npm run start
scripts.start-live: cd examples/ag-grid-quick-filter && npm install ag-grid-quick-filter@latest && npm run start
scripts.install: cd packages/ag-grid-quick-filter && npm install && cd ../../examples/ag-grid-quick-filter && npm install
